summary: This replaces the Master robes for females with a semi transparent noturnal dress.
descriptionHtml:
Transparent Silk Noturnal Dress
==========================
This is my first try at a mod, so I figured i\'d start out with simple texture / mesh replacment.

This replaces the Master mage robes for females with a semi transparent noturnal dress.

I will later add a more adult version, at the moment the private parts are darkened enough so you can\'t see anything unless you put the camera at just that right angle ;)

=============================================
To install:

Copy meshes & textures to skyrim/data

To uninstall:
Take a look at the folders in the archive and delete them from meshes and textures

=================================================
Content used:

If you arn\'t using a nude mod then the crappy looking burlap underwear will show.

you can download a ThePal\'s nude mod here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70

Everything else is (C) Bethesda
author: raziell74
